#summary Instructions for students of CS 665 to set up ROS on class machines.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

This page tells you how to set up your account with a functional ROS installation and UA packages. These will only work on the class machines located in GS 930 (the machine names all start with "h").

= Installation =

Easy!
  # Navigate to your home directory
{{{
cd ~
}}}
  # Download the install script 
{{{
wget http://ua-ros-pkg.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/config/install_ros_user
}}}
  # Make it executable
{{{
chmod +x install_ros_user
}}}
  # Run it!
{{{
./install_ros_user
}}}
